title: Verify Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Ensure that the Subscribe button is clickable and redirects to the subscription page.
steps: 1. Locate the Subscribe button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the Subscribe button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the subscription page.

title: Verify Discord Link Functionality
description: Ensure that the Discord button redirects to the Discord server invitation page.
steps: 1. Locate the Discord button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the Discord button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the Discord server invitation page.

title: Verify Archive Link Functionality
description: Ensure that the Archive button redirects to the archive page.
steps: 1. Locate the Archive button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the Archive button.
expected_result: User is redirected to the archive page.

title: Verify Dark Mode Toggle Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the Light/Dark mode toggle changes the theme of the webpage.
steps: 1. Locate the Light/Dark mode toggle button on the top navigation bar. 2. Click on the toggle button.
expected_result: The webpage theme changes from light to dark or vice versa.

title: Verify Search Functionality
description: Ensure that the search bar allows users to search for articles.
steps: 1. Locate the search bar under the Latest AI News header. 2. Enter a search term (e.g., 'AI'). 3. Press Enter or click the search icon.
expected_result: Search results related to the search term are displayed.

title: Verify Article Link Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the 'Original Article' link opens the original article in a new tab.
steps: 1. Locate the 'Original Article' link in the article section. 2. Click on the link.
expected_result: The original article opens in a new browser tab.

title: Verify Audio Button Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the Audio button starts playing the audio summary of the article.
steps: 1. Locate the Audio button in the article section. 2. Click on the Audio button.
expected_result: Audio summary of the article starts playing.

title: Verify NotebookLM Button Functionality
description: Ensure that clicking the NotebookLM button provides a link or action related to NotebookLM.
steps: 1. Locate the NotebookLM button in the article section. 2. Click on the NotebookLM button.
expected_result: The action related to NotebookLM is performed, such as opening a link or displaying content.

title: Verify Article Content Display
description: Ensure that the article content is displayed correctly with all sections visible.
steps: 1. View the article section under the Latest AI News header. 2. Verify the presence of 'Article Summary' and 'Discussion Highlights' sections.
expected_result: All article content, including 'Article Summary' and 'Discussion Highlights', is displayed correctly.

title: Verify Date and Time Format
description: Ensure that the date and time format is consistent and correct across the webpage.
steps: 1. Locate the date and time under the Latest AI News header. 2. Verify the format of the date and time displayed.
expected_result: Date is displayed in MM/DD/YYYY format and time is displayed in HH:MM:SS AM/PM format.
